applyTo: "**/*.js, **/*.html"
---

# TyranoScript Coding Standards

## Comments
- Main comments in English
- Optional clarifications in Japanese, Chinese, or Korean

## Naming Conventions
- JavaScript: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for classes
- HTML: semantic tags, id/class in kebab-case

## TyranoScript Guidelines
- Use TyranoScript tags/macros appropriately
- Separate game logic (JS) and scenario content (TyranoScript tags)
- Organize scenario files and assets clearly
- Use official TyranoScript Debug Tool for testing
  - Can be used by AI or humans
  - Prefer human usage for step-by-step debugging

## Testing
- Playtest frequently
- Validate JS/HTML syntax
- Use debug tool to confirm flow and variable states

## Formatter & Lint
- Prettier or ESLint for JS
- HTML validation tools
